entry.title: Corporate Jargon
entry.summary:
Author: ggomo_springtime

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,213Chapters: 21/22Kudos: 1,377

Summary: It was the most peculiar thing to see Daniel Fenton and Marinette Dupain-Cheng vehemently turn down a project. There was disgust. Barely concealed loathing. What was so strange about their bosses’ offer? They were about to be given a chance to redesign the suits of Justice League members and renovate part of the Watchtower.On a completely unrelated note, an incident with the Order and the use of ectoplasm forces the Celestial Guardian and the King of the Infinite Realms to finally meet.

entry.title: Heyyyyy, brother (There’s nothing in this world I wouldn’t do)
entry.summary:
Author: Trying414

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,444Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 12

Summary: For the Maribat? Get In! Discord Sidekicks Paradox Event~🦇🐞🦇~“You’re…dating Adrien?”“Are you homophobic now, Drake?”“I’m literally dating Kon and Bernard” Tim deadpans. “I just meant that it’s…a surprise. Not something we expected. Like, if you were to date someone, we would have expected Jon,” he shrugs.“Yeah, how did this happen, Baby Bat?”"We bonded when he kept sending me videos of an exotic dancer. He likes dancing and I'm exotic," Damian’s voice is flat.All three of his brothers father’s other sons stare at him.“Okay, no, what the actual fuck?”

entry.title: I Got Isekai’d Into Miraculous—Now They Want Me to Break the Love-Square?! Tch. I’m a Robin. I’ll Fix It My Way.
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 88,302Chapters: 33/52Kudos: 246

Summary: Five years Damian waited for the last Miraculous Ladybug manga, and the ending sucks. Enraged, he boasted he could write a better story. A mischievous, fourth-dimensional imp quickly appears and gives him a chance to prove his claim. To prevent a disappointing ending, he must change the plot as he sees fit. What would a genius detective, Robin, do in the MLB Universe, to cause Chaos of course! And He has a task to fulfill, a mission to accomplish: prevent the Love-Square from forming. Be the home-wrecker and steal Marinette from Adrien. Is he going to do it? For the sake of the mission? We'll see.

entry.title: The after effects of An Akuma.
entry.summary:
Author: Fateofwar

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,583Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 146

Summary: The idea for this work goes to Lilavaporizer9000, some part might be similar.I have little knowing of The DC world as compared to the Heralds and enforcers reading this fanfic. Some characters might be ooc, and if you find any case do tell.And English is not my first language, so any mistake or error is purely due to intervention of the keyboard and my spite for the language if I have any. So, Damian Wayne needs a girlfriend. His family won't stop pestering him with a normal teen life, not after he told them it would be better to spend 24 hours in the asylum rather than in this place where everyone seems to be losing their brain cells.A normal girlfriend would shut them better than anything. Which proved more difficult than solving criminal cases and fighting a Superman with a kryptonite dagger.The second option is find a small group of humans to meet his needs. Which seems impossible considering his general distain for them, as Dick calls it. He is one for sure.Luckily there is a match. Marinette Dupin-Cheng. She’s intelligent, quiet, respectful of his boundaries— generally acceptable.

entry.title: Ghost
entry.summary:
Author: Inarachi01

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,745Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 85

Summary: Damian’s world more than once has turned on its axis. As an assassin, as a vigilante, and as a civilian. His family have done their best to make the most of it. Even if they don’t always understand how his mind functions. Or his concept of courtship.Marinette is like a meteor. A disaster to burn and consume.She’s perfectly imperfect.A rogue attack, brings them together and the disaster consumes more than they bargained for.

entry.title: Breaking His Walls While Building Hers
entry.summary:
Author: Stellar_Arachnida

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,929Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Marinette has been chosen, or more like she was pushed to agree to be selected for the Foreign Exchange program hosted by the Gotham Academy and Collège Françoise Dupont. New adventures await our resident hero of Paris as she takes more responsibility onto her plate. Trying to learn her boundaries and lines that no one should cross, would she be the one to break the highly guarded heart of the one and only Damian Wayne? Additionally, in a dark space with few lights passing through, another shadow lurks... something wicked is brewing?

entry.title: Convergence In their Heart
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,423Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Following Adrien’s breakup and Lila Rossi’s cruel exposé, a heartbroken Marinette Dupain-Cheng snaps, assaulting a tourist she mistakes for her tormentor. This volatile, public outburst occurs against a backdrop of cosmic devastation, where the Convergence has caused worlds to collide and identities to unveil, turning Paris into a nexus of magic and danger. The chaotic attack quickly puts Marinette in opposition to Damian Wayne, the tourist’s extremely protective younger brother, whose icy composure is destroyed by the fury of their initial, explosive meeting. With the world in increasing chaos, their risky, forbidden rivalry creates a strong, undeniable connection.A powerful, beautiful convergence in their heart.

entry.title: Smiling Through
entry.summary:
Author: AKP31E

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,687Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 56

Summary: Damian Wayne doesn’t always get to do what he wants. Sometimes he simply has to smile through the unpleasant things, and sometimes the things that start out unpleasant turn out to be the best things in the end. Meeting Marinette occurred during one of those unpleasant things, and he thinks that if he can convince her to stay by his side that all the other unpleasant things he has to do would be much better, and he wouldn’t have to work quite so hard to smile through.

entry.title: letters to lovers (and the aftermath of cherry wine)
entry.summary:
Author: whoscountinganyway

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 176,300Chapters: 47/?Kudos: 3,465

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng and Damian Wayne-Al Ghul are pen-pals for three years, during that time, Marinette slowly but surely falls in love (and Damian falls with her). Damian has to heal from his childhood and Marinette is still changing from growing pains; they are leaving partners and friends and toxicity and gods behind them.**Warning: reading this may cause whiplash-inducing criterion shift.You will no longer view anger as mad or friends the same way. Your concepts of "childhood" and "the right thing" will forever be changed. You will not be able to change it back.The average species lasts four million years on earth. We've been around for 300,000 of those years, but our ancestors were born six million years ago. To live you must adapt; change. Are you changing? What does that say about you?Reading this may cause delusions. You might start seeing ghosts. Or get a therapist.

entry.title: Pinocchio (Or Demon Spawn Becomes a Real Boy)
entry.summary:
Author: Mentally12ReadingPJO

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 76,781Chapters: 25/42Kudos: 6,183

Summary: My first writing attempt in years and my first fanfic: read at your own risk :).Damian's brothers are curious: the demon seems to be acting like a real boy. It was subtle at first, but it became increasingly obvious when he called someone they caught "sus". It was even less subtle when they found him scrolling on his phone in a blanket at 2 am and whispered "ding" while flicking his wrist. Needless to say they were concerned.Will be continued far in the future...

entry.title: Defenders of the Universe
entry.summary:
Author: aldanavroon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,009Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 148

Summary: In a universe where divine forces walk reborn among mortals, balance is everything—and it’s breaking. The ancient Order of Guardians has fallen. Chaos stirs. And four Souls, once meant to appear one at a time, have returned all at once.Creation. Destruction. Lie. Intuition.They’re not ready. They’re not trusted. And one of them looks a little too much like someone Batman once called his son.As legends rise and secrets unravel, the fate of the multiverse may rest on the shoulders of children—ones who carry the weight of gods.

entry.title: Feast Your Eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Golden_Hew

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,713Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 97

Summary: “Take a seat! We're about to play Smash, Marry, Kill!” Kent patted the cushion beside him with the attention-seeking of a retriever searching for pets. Damian reluctantly sat, only then spotting the mischievous plan of his supposed friend. "La-adybug!" He choked out, coughing up his spit. What use did he have for honor now? - Stuck playing Smash, Marry, Kill with Kent and Paris's Court, Robin learns something about Ladybug that might just change everything.

entry.title: An Email Away
entry.summary:
Author: LovelyLore

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,602Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 10,828

Summary: Marinette had been startled to find out that her school and a school in America were collaborating to do a pen pal assignment. To be fair, the assignment was suppose to help the students with the grammar of the language they were learning. Marinette pulled a random name out of the box. She hoped Damian wrote good French and that she could write well enough English.
